key_deadlines.Section_21_Expiry: July 31st, 2026 (Last date to start court action for old S21s)
key_deadlines.Information_Sheet: May 31st, 2026 (Mandatory distribution to all existing tenants)

rules.Notice_Periods: Landlord: 4 months (after 12 months occupancy). Tenant: 2 months (any time).
rules.Rental_Bidding: Illegal. Accepting offers above asking is a criminal offense.
rules.Rent_Increases: Section 13 only. Once every 12 months. 2 months notice.
rules.Pets: Cannot unreasonably refuse. Landlord can mandate tenant insurance.

EPC_2030_Roadmap.hard_deadline: October 1st, 2030 (Universal EPC C required for all tenancies)

cost_caps.backdating: Works since Oct 2025 count toward cap.
